channel.title: [PI]-DroidX Now Recruiting!-[NOT A DSPK LEECH]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A0L62.png[/img]
[B][U]-DroidX Looking for a Team-
Spots Needed:[/U][/B] -Hoster (Until we can afford VPS) -Extra Coder -Client Side Coder -GFX Handler [B][U] -What is DroidX-[/U][/B] DroidX was started 2 years ago when RSPS's were very populuar, When my server was pretty known, I was DDoSed by a constant 400kb/s which lead to my
server shutting down. After time I started developing a new server, DroidX was back in action. When I started to code, The good ol' days came to mind and I
thought, Why not make this server OldSkool and just have people Pk the shit out of it? So I started coding, Adding alot of stuff and doing as much as I can. So I
present you with DroidX
[B][U]-Why You Should Join Us-[/U][/B] Not only will this be a gread Journey in the RSPS game, but This will also be a learning experience for everyone. I try my best to support you with the most I can
and hope that you guys choose my team to help us out!
[B]To Do List:[/B] -Add Ancients -Add Lunar -Add FunPk -Add more Donator Interfaces -Add Donator Chest (THIS IS WHAT I CAN THINK OF AS OF RIGHT NOW. I WILL UPDATE SOON) [B] Pictures:[/B] [hide] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Evz0q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TJV1K.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vHbLL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/p4Nhx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6IjGo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/E5aDW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6FyKA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F3DUr.png[/img] [/hide]
-Thank you for Reading-
[B]Ways to contact me:[/B] PM Me via Runelocus Add me on MSN: [email]DroidEx@live.com[/email]

item.title: [PI]-DroidX Now Recruiting!-[NOT A DSPK LEECH]
item.dc:creator: @samoankilla samoankilla
item.description:
@samoankilla wrote:

[B][U]-DroidX Looking for a Team-

Spots Needed:[/U][/B]
-Hoster (Until we can afford VPS)
-Extra Coder
-Client Side Coder
-GFX Handler

-What is DroidX-
DroidX was started 2 years ago when RSPS’s were very populuar, When my server was pretty known, I was DDoSed by a constant 400kb/s which lead to my

server shutting down. After time I started developing a new server, DroidX was back in action. When I started to code, The good ol’ days came to mind and I

thought, Why not make this server OldSkool and just have people Pk the shit out of it? So I started coding, Adding alot of stuff and doing as much as I can. So I

present you with DroidX

-Why You Should Join Us-
Not only will this be a gread Journey in the RSPS game, but This will also be a learning experience for everyone. I try my best to support you with the most I can

and hope that you guys choose my team to help us out!

To Do List:
-Add Ancients
-Add Lunar
-Add FunPk
-Add more Donator Interfaces
-Add Donator Chest
(THIS IS WHAT I CAN THINK OF AS OF RIGHT NOW. I WILL UPDATE SOON)

Pictures:

[/hide]

-Thank you for Reading-
